abstract: The talks between the two drug makers continue to center on the possible use of a contingent value right, a deal mechanism that allows for additional payouts if Genzyme hits certain milestones.
snippet: The talks between the two drug makers continue to center on the possible use of a contingent value right, a deal mechanism that allows for additional payouts if Genzyme hits certain milestones.
lead_paragraph: Jan. 9, 4:03 p.m. | Updated Sanofi-Aventis confirmed on Sunday that it was in discussions with Genzyme about potentially using contingent value rights to bolster its current takeover offer for the pharmaceutical company.

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
